attributes.action: Change the curriculum to include health education by professionals not teachers
attributes.additional_details: This will educate children and parents in how to eat healthy. What to watch out for. Improve their mental health and prevent or at least make the youth aware of how to be healthier and diabetes free!
attributes.background: Introduce health education, including diabetes prevention, from Year 7, led by professional coaches. Early prevention is better than cure—don’t wait until adulthood.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "professional coaches" and "professionals" rather than teachers.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
